data.name: Cure.fit Co-Founder Ankit Nagori - A Candid conversation about his Entrepreneurial Journey : Converting an idea into a successful start up - Opportunities , Challenges & Learning.
data.summary: Ankit Nagori talks about his Entrepreneurial journey from Flipkart to Curefit: Converting an idea to a successful startup, the opportunities, challenges and learnings.
data.speakers:
Ankit Nagori, Curefit

Moderators:
Rajesh Munjal, COO, Carzonrent India Pvt. Ltd,
Himanshu Gupta, Past National President, Round Table India
